title: cssnext介绍以及使用
content:
什么是cssnext

PostCSS-cssnext is a PostCSS plugin that helps you to use the latest CSS syntax today. It transforms new CSS specs into more compatible CSS so you don’t need to wait for browser support.

意思就是你现在就可以使用css的一些新的语法 即使现在的浏览器不支持 你也可以去使用

Features

变量

:root {
    --mainColor: red;
}

a {
    color: var(--mainColor);
}

// limited to :root selector

:root {
    --danger-theme: {
        color: white;
        background-color: red;
    }
}

.danger {
    @apply --danger-theme;
}

计算

:root {
    --fontSize: 1rem;
}
h1 {
    font-size: calc(var(--fontSize) *  2);
}

nesting

a {
    color: #fff;
    &:hover {
        color: red;
    }
}

image-set

.foot {
    background-image: image-set(
    	url(img/test.png) 1x,
        url(img/test2.png) 2x,
        url(default.png) 600dpi,
    )
}

更多

使用

create-react-app

npm run eject

然后在webpack.config.js

loader: require.resolve("postcss-loader"),
       options: {
         // Necessary for external CSS imports to work
         // https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app/issues/2677
         ident: "postcss",
         plugins: () => [
           require("postcss-flexbugs-fixes"),
           require("postcss-preset-env")({
             autoprefixer: {
               flexbox: "no-2009",
             },
            /* start */
             stage: 3,
             features: {
               "nesting-rules": true,
             },
           /* end */
           }),
         }
